name: RKS System
description: The Pokemon's physiology morphs according to the data disc inserted in its RKS-drive. There are 17 discs, one for each Type. (No disc is Normal Type).
effect: Change the Pokemon's Type to match the Disc on its Held Item slot. (i.e. Electric Disc makes this Pokemon become an Electric Type). This Ability cannot be swapped, copied, replaced or nullified (ignoring the effects of Skill Swap, Worry Seed, Gastro Acid, Trace etc.)
